Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2879 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 25.0.3-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-2879 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 25.0.3-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 25.0.3-3, affected by CVE-2022-2879
